title.rendered: 20% OFF All Toys in October @ Gottwals Books

content.rendered: At Gottwals Books, Melissa & Doug ® toys are all 20% off during the month of October! Come in and explore our great selection of educational and motor-skill building toys and games.

excerpt.rendered: At Gottwals Books, Melissa & Doug ® toys are all 20% off during the month of October! Come in and explore our great selection of educational and motor-skill building toys and games.
